title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit, the perfect addition to your indoor or garden space! 

Designed with safety and convenience in mind, this fire pit is fueled by bioethanol, a clean and environmentally friendly fuel. With its sleek concrete design in a graphite color and a base that mimics the elegance of marble, it not only creates a warm and cozy atmosphere but also doubles as a stylish table decor.

Rest assured knowing that this fire pit comes with essential safety features. The burn cup is made of stainless steel to ensure durability, and the rapid cooling technology swiftly cools the burn chamber after use. Additionally, a flat stainless steel extinguisher tool is included for your peace of mind.

This fire pit is not only portable but also versatile. You can easily move it from indoors to the garden, depending on your preference. It is perfect for cooking delicious treats like smores and marshmallows, adding a touch of fun to your gatherings.

With a burn time of over 1 hour, you can enjoy the warmth and ambiance for longer. The marble effect base provides heat dissipation, ensuring your safety while enjoying the fire pit.

For increased efficiency and burn time, the fire pit includes a ceramic wool insert. This innovative feature enhances the overall experience, making your fire pit even more enjoyable.

Don't miss out on the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit, the perfect companion for cozy evenings and memorable moments. Get yours today and elevate your space with warmth and elegance!

This fire pit is perfect for creating a warm and cosy atmosphere in both indoor and garden settings. With its mini size and portable design, you can easily move it around and place it wherever you desire. 

The Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit uses bio ethanol as its fuel, ensuring a safe and clean burning experience. It comes with safety flashback arrestors to prevent any accidents. 

Featuring a stylish concrete material in a graphite color with a marble effect base, this fire pit not only provides warmth but also adds a touch of elegance to your table decor. The heat dissipating base ensures that the surface stays cool to the touch, making it safe for elderly users. 

Not only does this fire pit create a cosy atmosphere, but it also doubles as a cooking tool. You can use it to cook delicious smores and marshmallows, bringing joy and delight to your gatherings. 

With over 1 hour of burn time, you can enjoy the warmth and ambiance for an extended period. The stainless steel burn cup and rapid cooling feature guarantee safety, while the flat stainless steel extinguisher tool is included for your convenience. 

To enhance the burn time and efficiency, the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit comes with a ceramic wool insert. This feature ensures that you get the most out of your fuel and enjoy prolonged use. 

Experience the comfort and convenience of the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your home or garden.
